overview.description: Orange Digital Center is a free, fully integrated ecosystem offering technological programs and tools for individuals, startups, and young talents. It focuses on skills development, innovation, entrepreneurship, and community engagement, acting as a catalyst for job creation and impactful projects.

programs.INFO: As a true network of opportunities, Orange Digital Centers bring together several strategic programs into one place

coding_school.info: this is the coding school program at ODC
coding_school.name: Coding School
coding_school.description: A free technological center for young developers, innovators, and project enthusiasts. It targets students, graduates, and aspiring entrepreneurs.
offerings: Hands-on training in coding languages and software development.
Workshops, bootcamps and hackathons to boost practical skills.
Trainings to help people navigate the evolving digital world.
Trainings for children and teenagers to develop digital skills with the program super coders on coding, robotics and so on.

fablab_solidaires.info: this is the fablab program at ODC (Orange digital center)
fablab_solidaires.name: FabLab Solidaires
fablab_solidaires.description: A free digital production workshop for creating prototypes using advanced tools like 3D printers, UV Machine, CNC Milling Machine and laser cutters. Supports youth, students, graduates, and entrepreneurs.
offerings: Access to high-end digital fabrication tools.
We help people turn their ideas into reality by providing prototyping support and materials.
Training on prototyping, 3D modeling, and manufacturing.
Support for transforming ideas into real-world products.
At the FabLab, we offer a variety of programs and activities including internships (PFE and PFA), summer challenges, and a Project Maker program that lasts up to two months.
We also provide specialized training sessions that range from one to five days, covering topics such as 3D printing, laser cutting, motherboard repair, IOT and installation of security cameras.
We also provide longer training courses (1-2 months) in phone and tablet repair, including software aspects like flashing and decoding smartphones.

'Solar Green' is our new program empowering individuals with knowledge on all aspects of solar energy. We offer training in installation, repair, and energy assessment to help you optimize solar solutions for residential and industrial needs.

past implemented projects.Info: Here are some of the projects that have been implemented by the the FabLab Solidaires Community during programms

past implemented projects.name: Autonomous Insect Detection Drone named 'Igran'
past implemented projects.description: The Autonomous Insect Detection Drone was implemented during the 2024 summer challenge at fablab ODC Agadir, provides early warning of pest infestations in tomato crops, identifying insect presence before damage is visible to the naked eye.

past implemented projects.name: Smart home automation
past implemented projects.description: A system to automate home appliances like lights, fans, and thermostat using a smartphone app.

past implemented projects.name: ODAC - Early Cardiac Alert Bracelet
past implemented projects.description: This medical bracelet detects heart attacks up to 1 minute and 30 seconds before they strike, providing crucial early warning that enables rapid response and potentially life-saving intervention. A game-changer for hospitals and individuals alike.

past implemented projects.name: Raspberry Pi Based Emotion Recognition System
past implemented projects.description: A system that detects the emotion of people entering into a space and stores data in the cloud for further analytics.

past implemented projects.name: Raspberry Pi Retro Arcade Machine
past implemented projects.description: A retro arcade machine built using Raspberry Pi.

past implemented projects.name: Recycling PET Plastic to Filament
past implemented projects.description: filament machine that is recycling PET plastic and also helps reduce the cost of 3D printing.

past implemented projects.name: Two-Wheeled Drive Car With a Robotic Arm
past implemented projects.description: a robotic arm mounted on a Two Wheeled Drive vehicle designed to perform various manipulation tasks in dynamic environments.

past implemented projects.name: Autoguided Telescope
past implemented projects.description: This motorized Dobsonian telescope automatically finds your chosen stars, making stargazing an awe-inspiring adventure for beginners and experienced astronomers alike.

past implemented projects.name: AI Voice Assistant with Raspberry Pi
past implemented projects.description: A voice assistant powered by AI and Raspberry Pi using rag, helps visitors navigate the fablab solidaire answering questions and help with materials availble and trainings.

orange_fab.name: Orange Fab
orange_fab.description: A startup accelerator that forges business partnerships with the Orange Group. Focuses on managerial capabilities and commercial development.
offerings: Networking with industry leaders and investors.
Business acceleration and pathways to global markets.

why_choose.INFO: this the values of the Orange Digital Center and the reason to choose to join or participate in one of the programs
reasons: Empowering Communities: Creating inclusive learning environments for all.
Fostering Innovation: Providing technology and guidance to turn ideas into reality.
Driving Entrepreneurship: Accelerating startups and skills for the future market.
Strong Global Network: Access to mentors, investors, and Orangeâ€™s international ecosystem.

address.INFO: this is where ODC Agadir is located
address.fablab: Technopark Tilila, Agadir, Lower Ground Floor (-1).

location_accessibility.operating_hours: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

access_requirements.who_can_access: Open to everyone (students, professionals, startups, enthusiasts).
access_requirements.entry_process: Visit the location and seek permission from staff.
access_requirements.cost: All services and access are free of charge.

equipment.INFO: this is the equipment available at ODC Agadir => head to materials_detailed for more details on the equipment
materials: accessories (Raspberry Pi cases, SD cards, VR headsets)

activities: Project Maker program (up to two months)

Project to work on.more: You can request any materials or tools you need for your project. The center will provide you with the necessary equipment and support.

support_assistance.description: Responsible staff are available to help with materials, permissions, programs, and project development.

eligibility_criteria.nationality: Open to Moroccan citizens and residents in Morocco.
eligibility_criteria.motivation_interest: Demonstrated interest and motivation for coding, digital careers, or entrepreneurship.
eligibility_criteria.engagement: Commitment to attending training, internships, and workshops.

steps: Submission of application through www.orangedigitalcenters.com, including personal information.
Official notification of selection by phone call or email.
